website_summaries.verdict: If you’ve ever wanted to test out the slimming effects of the pescatarian diet, this information-packed weight loss cookbook is the perfect way to get started.
pros: Over 100 seafood and vegetable based meals
Examples include blueberry corn cake, grilled salmon, and catfish with cucumbers
cons: Only for people who enjoy eating fish

customer_reviews.title: Great overall book
customer_reviews.text: My son recently became a pescatarian so I wanted to learn more about the pescatarian concept, but from a quick, yet professional stance. So having found this book I would have to say that, it’s a good fit to learn the basics about the pescatarian diet plan. The recipes included are pretty helpful, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I am loving this !
customer_reviews.text: I could not wait to write this review...this book is the boom y'all...don't waste your money on no other pescetarian plan book...while I was reading it...she writes as if she is in the room with you...and the book is so informative...the recipes are simple... I love the less ingredients ones...she refers to different chapters while you are reading to help you get better understanding....you know this was going to be a great read when I read that she worked with Bob Greene...lots of advice and its just makes sense...amazing...thanks
customer_reviews.author: gracee

customer_reviews.title: Pescetarian diet works for me!
customer_reviews.text: My cardiologist told me that to reverse my moderate blockages I should eat a vegetarian + fish diet without providing any detail. This book provides all the detail and it is so much easier for me to stick with than Ornish or Pritikin.
customer_reviews.author: George Glendenning

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to follow recipes and great info on what type of seafood to get and to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Qualls

customer_reviews.title: EAT RIGHT, TO LIVE RIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Great , and easy recipes, that won't hurt your pocketbook! And very tasty, whether, it's for breakfast, lunch or dinner! You can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Scott

customer_reviews.title: Simple and healthy recipes and advice for a better you!
customer_reviews.text: The author clearly explains the benefits of following a pescetarian diet and backs it up with the science to support it. The recipes are delicious and easy to make. I recently came off a weight loss regimen and was worried that it would be difficult to maintain my new weight. Following the helpful advice in this book/cookbook has really helped me.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great info. I don't find the recipes to be that great
customer_reviews.author: Wilddancer

customer_reviews.title: I love this book
customer_reviews.text: If you want to get healthy and lose weight this is the optimal diet. Well written and researched. Recipes are top notch. I love this book. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Mann

customer_reviews.title: What a great book.
customer_reviews.text: That book is very complete and well written. The author is going in details on how this diet is great and how it is a life style more than anything else. I love it from beginning to the end. I have changed my diet to that one and the response is great, I feel more satisfied, don't have cravings anymore, have lots of food to choose from and I lost weight on top of everything. Just take the time to read it and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Mom At Home

customer_reviews.title: Depends .....
customer_reviews.text: If you like cucumbers, beets, collards, okra, parsley or Tofu, buy this book. Btw not many pesci recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Good book
customer_reviews.text: Have tried several of the recipes and they are ones you can actually find all the ingredients for they turned out delicious.
customer_reviews.author: fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Very useful recipe book.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thorough explanation of the Pesceterian Diet with may great recipes. Can't wait to try all of them. Well worth the money for this cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B. Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Wheres the recipes
customer_reviews.text: 150 pages before you even get to a recipe! Then there are just and handful for each meal type and they are horribly organized.
customer_reviews.author: preston

customer_reviews.title: I am loving that the science of different nutrients and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am loving that the science of different nutrients and their actions in the body is being explained, with cited studies to back up the information.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent reference book as well as great recipes. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Love this Book!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this book!! Full explanation of the Pescetarian Decision. Beautiful pictures and wonderful recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will never be hungry promise, and the flavor yummy.
customer_reviews.text: Clearly explained in detail ( which is always important) the recepies are awesome very easy to prepare and very flavorful. Go on take the next step. Become a pescatarian (eat sea food) Buy this book . It’s all you need to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind l.

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye FAT! Hello healthy❤️
customer_reviews.text: Excellent book and easy read. I stay on this eating plan 90% of the year. Best eating plan ever. I am an NP so see the outcome of poor eating choices daily. I did loose the last 10lb of fat & fifty weight and have kept it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE COOKBOOK
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the recipes. Quite a selection. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Too New to Review
customer_reviews.text: I did have had little chance to review. Unfair of me to comment
customer_reviews.author: PrimoUser

customer_reviews.title: Not well edited. Use common sense following recipes. If it doesn't seem right, it probably isn't.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to let one recipe away an overall opinion about this book. I'm still excited about the Pescatarian diet. That said, the publisher should have done a better job of editing. Found a recipe on page 212 that called for a 1/4 cup of salt plus 1 tsp. of salt for a single recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Great book! Detailed and tastie recipes. I highly recommend for the no land animal eaters. Enjoyed the veggie meatballs!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only wish it came with a more comprehensive shopping list with lead times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family treat
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved it. Thanks for keeping me updated on gift books for my family. It is important to let kids know that books provide lots of good information
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B. Schnepp

customer_reviews.title: Very informational their are great recipes so I'm giving 5 stars But I wish ...
customer_reviews.text: Very informational their are great recipes so I'm giving 5 stars But I wish their was more recipes still worth getting tho
customer_reviews.author: alexis fassnacht

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book, It has really helped me along my path to wellness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes, can’t wait to try them. Will share this book with others.
customer_reviews.author: Ruff

customer_reviews.title: Even More Reasons to Love Fish!
customer_reviews.text: Janis Jibrin makes a convincing case for combining the eating habits of vegetarians with increased seafood consumption in this very informative and helpful book, which is part cookbook and part nutritional guide. She carefully takes you through the steps of transforming your shopping and eating habits in order to become a pescetarian to enjoy the benefits of weight loss and increased energy among others. Includes a nice selection of recipes, ranging from center of the plate entrees to snacks. You'll want to get on a first name basis with your local fishmonger after reading The Pescetarian Plan.
customer_reviews.author: Dee LongTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Easy to understand and follow.  Delicious recipes.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the Pescetarian Plan. It is very clear, informative and motivating. The pictures are beautiful and the two recipes I have made (shrimp taco salad and chickpeas roasted with oregano) are delicious. I am looking forward to using her exchange program for losing the last few lbs. She has 4 different exchanges, 1500 cal. 1800 cal, 2100 cal and 2500 cal. Very clear and easy to follow. An excellent book.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Morrison

customer_reviews.title: easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: Having been told to give up meat I found this book very helpful. It was written for the layman and the information is easily understood. The recipes look interesting and make this new style of eating less daunting for me.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Kulka

product_meta.title: The Pescetarian Plan: The Vegetarian + Seafood Way to Lose Weight and Love Your Food: A Cookbook
